name: Historic Groundwater Data Interactive Map
disclaimer:
Welcome to the Historic Groundwater Data Interactive Map. This project is a joint effort between CSU Libraries Archives and Special Collections and the Geospatial Centroid.

The focus of this map is on field data sheets which reveal histroic groundwater levels from select areas along the front range.

Clicking the blue rectangles on the map reveal the scanned maps used to locate grounwater wells, and the points link to the scanned field data sheets used to collection measurements.
